description:
Despite the towering walls, electric fences and the fact that 
you can’t leave, you should be thankful to be serving time 
here. The Glorious Leader sees and hears all. Every day 
you must attend roll call in the shadow of his almighty 
monument!

Experience the thrill of escaping the hidden compound 
deep in the jungle. You’ll need determination and drive to 
avoid the unquestioningly devoted guards, constant 
surveillance, and the illustrious Leader himself, in your bid 
for freedom.

And remember to praise your Glorious Leader!
name: The Escapists 2 - The Glorious Regime
